website_summaries.verdict: A smooth, black and white-swirled charcoal mask that will prove its worth in a single use.
pros: Many users notice results after one use
Moisturizes and improves circulation of skin
cons: Some say that it's too harsh for dry skin

customer_reviews.title: skins stains are like disappearing, and it just works its magic
customer_reviews.text: You feel a tingling as the charcoal works your skin. I've noticed a huge difference with my pores clearing out, skins stains are like disappearing, and it just works its magic. I use it almost every other day, and keeps my skin clear, bright, and healthy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Love It!! Other mud masks I have used in the past are hard to apply and dries hard and stiff and feels like my face was going to crack . It cleanses my pores and leaves my skin is silky smooth. This goes on smooth and creamy and dries firm not stiff. I am on my 2nd bottle!!
customer_reviews.author: mtm

customer_reviews.title: very good if you get the trick
customer_reviews.text: tricky to apply since its lumpy, just make sure you grab small amounts and spread it well until you have a thick even layer. Then relax until its dry! imho its easier to remove with wet wipes or a sponge. with plain warm water its very messy and hard to remove. The skin looks amazing after
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Hebel

customer_reviews.title: Great face mask
customer_reviews.text: this product really cleans out your pores, it stings a little at first but it makes your skin feel so clean and smooth and it also adds a brightness to your complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Dries out but I like it anyway
customer_reviews.text: At this point in time, it's easy to remove and does great at removing impurities from the skin. After a while, it'll start to dry out a little in the container and you get lumps of black clay. Still, this is my second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal Mask
customer_reviews.text: After using this product my skin felt smooth and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This product really helped my skin transform from fair to great.
customer_reviews.author: Ozito

customer_reviews.title: Great Charcoal Mask
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff! Makes my face feel very clean, and helps with blackheads. Love the tingle it creates!
customer_reviews.author: Alecia Irick

customer_reviews.title: Good face mask
customer_reviews.text: I've used it about 3 times now, haven't seen visible results yet (my skin is pretty clean). But I do like the feel of the mask on my skin, as it tightens and has a mild 'burn' sensation when it's cleaning the skin. I probably wouldn't recommend this to people with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: dima boyko

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to use and seemed to have impact on the first application.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Pogel

customer_reviews.title: This mask is the best I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This mask is the best I've ever used! My skin is soft after using this and my deep pores are cleaned out. Thank-you Active-Wow!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is great for those who have oily skin. The mud dries and soaks up any oils you may have. The best part is the amount of product you get.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: My face has never felt so soft!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE it. Its my absolute favorite mask! The jar is a good size. You actually receive quiet a bit of product compared to a-lot of competing brands. My skin is pretty sensitive and I usually have to take these sort of things off pretty quickly because they start to burn. This one didn't at all. It was removed very easily with a wet rag. And my skin was left feeling cleaner than ever. I will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie
